caption:
Your hair’s new power couple 💕

Both fight frizz. Both protect from heat. But they play very different roles! ❤️

🌸 The Spray – Think of it as your daily prep step.
 Lightweight, silicone-free, and packed with Hyaluronic Acid for hydration + instant detangling. Use before styling or air drying for soft, frizz-free strands.

🌺 The Serum – Your final touch.
Velvety, shine-boosting, and rich in Snail Mucin + Hydrolyzed Quinoa to seal in moisture, smooth flyaways, and protect color - all while keeping frizz at bay for 24 hours.

Together? Flawless. Apart? Still heroes.
Which one are you reaching for first? 👇
